title: mediawiki/revision/score
description: Represents a MW Revision Score event (from ORES).

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema_name/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue/dataset that this event belongs in

database.description: The name of the wiki database this event entity belongs to.

performer.description: Represents the user that performed this change.

user_id.description: The user id that performed this change.  This is optional, and will not be present for anonymous users.

user_text.description: The text representation of the user that performed this change.

user_groups.description: A list of the groups this user belongs to.  E.g. bot, sysop etc.

user_is_bot.description: True if this user is considered to be a bot at the time of this event. This is checked via the $user->isBot() method, which considers both user_groups and user permissions.

user_registration_dt.description: The datetime of the user account registration. Not present for anonymous users or if missing in the MW database.

user_edit_count.description: The number of edits this user has made at the time of this event. Not present for anonymous users.

page_id.description: The page ID of the page this revision belongs to.

page_title.description: The normalized title of the page this revision belongs to.

page_namespace.description: The namespace of the page this revision belongs to.

page_is_redirect.description: True if this revision is a redirect.  This fact is ultimately represented by revision content containing redirect wikitext.  If this revision is the head revision of the page, then the page will also be a redirect.

rev_parent_id.description: The parent revison ID of the revision that this event represents.

rev_timestamp.description: The revision's creation time in ISO8601 format.  This field does not end in '_dt' to better match the field name on the Mediawiki revision table.

model_name.description: The name of the model used for this score.

model_version.description: The version of the model used for this score.

prediction.description: A list of predictions made by this model.

probability.description: A list of probabilities made by this model. Each element is a key/value with a probability name and a probability value.

errors.description: Errors that occured when models attempted to score this revision. Each error uses the model name as a map key.

model_name.description: The name of the model that encountered this error.

model_version.description: The version of the model that encountered this error.

type.description: The short name of this error

message.description: A human-readable explanation of what went wrong
